name: Clairvoyance Fishing Club
description:
A part of the click-or-treat Halloween bundle: https://twitter.com/halloweenbundle

Who doesn't love to take a break from the hustle and bustle of daily life to enjoy some time alone in nature? Enjoy the solitude of the pier as you fish your worries away in Clairvoyance Fishing Club. Play a variety of classic and not-so-classic mini-games to catch fish, and face the consequences of your actions through surrealist visual novel segments along the way.

  • Completely normal, not-weird-at-all fishing mechanics
  • A hybrid of visual novel and mini-game collection
  • Bite-sized ruminations on art and alcohol abuse

Estimated playtime: 25 minutes.

Content warning:
This game contains themes of alcohol abuse and death.
